channel.title: Fast attacking
channel.description:
I have a pimpscape source and if you keep clicking on attack then it will continously hit even though i have risen the action timer.
I have been on other servers where if you do this it doesnt happen.
Anyone know how to solve this?
Thanks - J0k3r[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 11:20:08 AM[/size][hr]Can either pm me or talk on msn
